raw_answer.rationale: Detected both bottom x-axis (0–160) and top x-axis (0–100%) tick scales in the same plot area.

trace.model_output_excerpt:
THOUGHT: The chart shows two different x-axes (bottom 0–160 and top 0–100%), a classic dual-axis setup that can mislead comparisons. I will first verify the bottom x-axis, then check for a top_x axis to confirm dual-axis usage.

ACTION: {"tool":"axis_localizer","args":{"image":{"$ref":"input.image"},"axis":"x","axis_threshold":0.2}}

THOUGHT: The chart clearly shows two x-axes: a bottom axis labeled 0–160 and a top axis labeled 0–100%, indicating a dual-axis setup that can mislead comparisons.
